long_description: The toddler girls' REI L'amour Socks are made with CoolMax(R) polyester for long-lasting stretch and moisture-wicking comfort on little feet. CoolMax blended with acrylic, rayon and nylon supplies durability; a touch of spandex offers stretch and shape retention. Light cushioning in the heels and toes adds shock absorption and protection from wear. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The toddler girls' REI L'amour Socks are made with CoolMax(R) polyester for long-lasting stretch and moisture-wicking comfort on little feet.
